column2: House panel claims oversight of state climate probes into Exxon HOUSTON A Republican-led congressional committee sought on Friday to assert oversight over inquiries that about 20 states are making into Exxon Mobil and climate change
column3: reiterating demands to know more about state attorneys general's consultations with environmental groups. ~U.S. House panel claims oversight of state climate probes into Exxon HOUSTON

column5: reiterating demands to know more about state attorneys general's consultations with environmental groups. ~
